offerings.description:
Tremendously increases the chance to be sent to Ormond when burnt.

Aug. 28th, ‘96
“A dormant darkness lies beneath his childlike smile, about to be awaken.”

Slightly increases the chances of being sent to Haddonfield when burnt.
Stacks.
"A washed out informational leaflet for the '78 Haddonfield Harvest Festival. A large cartoon pumpkin is depicted on the front."

Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories.
Personal.Stacks.
"This picture of a cake sure is real."

Tremendously increases the chance to be sent to Midwich Elementary School when burnt.
"In my restless dreams, I see that town."

Calms The Entity and Slightly increases the distance between sacrificial hooks appearing in the world.
Stacks.
"A deteriorating piece of petrified wood."

Tremendously increases the chance to be sent to Grave of Glenvale when burnt.
“Ask anyone trying to survive on this dust-choked land and they'll tell you what a noose really is—a damn mercy.”

Grants 50% bonus Bloodpoints in the Altruism category.
Personal.Stacks.
"A palm-sized hand-sewn sachet containing 4 gold petals. The primrose opens at the very last moment before the sun gives place to the night."

Grants 50% bonus Bloodpoints in the Sacrifice category.
Stacks.
"Crafted out of sticks, strings and bones, this wreath calls on The Entity's blessing for more blood."

Slightly increases the chances of being sent to Backwater Swamp when burnt.
Stacks.
"A burnt piece of marine rope still emitting a warm smoke."

Calls upon The Entity for the brightest moonlight.
"As the moon rises, the wolves howl, marking the beginning of the hunt."

Allows you to take on the role of The Pig for the next trial. Your current perks and add-ons will not be used.
Secret.
"Amanda, do not be afraid. Your life has just begun."-Jigsaw

Calls upon The Entity to generate 1 Lunar Vessel.As a Killer, hook a Survivor to corrupt the Vessels in the trial and make them temporarily destructible. Destroying a Vessel earns Moonrise progress and bonus Bloodpoints.As a Survivor, take and escape the trial with a Vessel to earn Moonrise progress and bonus Bloodpoints.Only playable during The Moonrise Event.Completing the Moonrise event will earn you Golden Coins for use in the Store.NOTE: During the event, 2 default Lunar Vessels will spawn in the map.Stacks.
"The Red Envelope is filled with crisp, new bills that bring luck and happiness."

Slightly increases luck of all Survivors.
Stacks.
"A small cotton pouch filled with black salt crystals. Some believe it brings good fortune. Don't spill it."

Grants 50% bonus Bloodpoints in the Boldness category.
Personal.Stacks.
"A palm-sized hand-sewn sachet containing a mix of pale petals and glaucous bluish leaves. Releases a strong spicy, clove-like scent."

Grants the ability to kill the last survivor by your hand during the next trial.
Secret.
"You worked well, the last one is yours."

Calls upon The Entity to Moderately decrease the distance between sacrificial hooks appearing in the world.
Stacks.
"A decomposing piece of oak in which strange markings have been etched."

Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Gideon Meat Packing Plant when burnt.
"Congratulations. You are still alive. Most people are so ungrateful to be alive. But not you. Not anymore."

Slightly increases the chances of being sent to Crotus Prenn Asylum when burnt.
Stacks.
"A worn and faded-out ticket of paper with unreadable information."

You start the trial as far as possible from the Killer.
Secret.
"I found marvels through the years in The Fog, but only now do I understand how to bend The Fog's irrefragable rules." -Vigo's Journal

Slightly increases the chances of being sent to the MacMillan Estate when burnt.
Stacks.
"A torn and faded-out ledger page with unreadable information except for the MacMillan stamp."

Grants 25% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories to all Survivors.
Stacks.
"An opened envelope re-sealed and bound with 4 colored ribbons."

Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories for all players this trial.
Stacks
"A reminder of a bloody good time when people came together, but left screaming."

Calls upon The Entity to generate 1 Blighted Hook and 1 Blighted Generator.As a Killer, hook a Survivor on a Blighted Hook for the first time to earn bonus Bloodpoints.As a Survivor, find and repair a Blighted Generator to earn bonus Bloodpoints.Using this offering increases the amount of Bloodpoints earned for these interactions.NOTE: During the event, 1 default Blighted Hook and 1 default Blighted Generator will spawn in the map.Stacks.Only playable during the Withering Blight Event.
"The pustulas fill the air with a rancid odor that some may find enticing."

Grants 25% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories.
Personal.Stacks.
"An unaddressed and unopened envelope yellowed by time. Its message will never be known."

Grants 75% bonus Bloodpoints in the Survival category.
Personal.Stacks.
"The pale green leaves are highlighted with peculiar crimson veins. Amaranth is said to be everlasting."

Grants 25% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories.
Stacks.
"An unidentifiable cocoon which was breached by whatever was inside."

Calls on The Entity to prevent the appearance of 2 chests.
Stacks.
"Two halves of a thick metallic coin."

Slightly thickens the Dark Mist.
Stacks.
"Paralyzed, I stand in the cold as death lingers."

Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints in the Boldness category.
Personal.Stacks.
"A bunch of flowers with pink petals and a blood red core. Releases a strong spicy, clove-like scent."

Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness category.
Stacks.
"Crafted with a fiery, undying passion out of blackened branches and coals, this wreath calls on The Entity's blessing for more blood."

Considerably increases the chances of being sent to Crotus Prenn Asylum when burnt.
Stacks.
"A pink paper ticket identifying Philip Elliott as to be transferred to Crotus Prenn Asylum."

Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints in the Objective category.
Personal.Stacks.
"A beautiful purple flower that grows in the midst of the tainted swamp. Releases a strong tea-like aroma."

Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories.
Personal.Stacks.
"A heavily salted pudding…"

Grants 50% bonus Bloodpoints in the Survival category.
Personal.Stacks.
"A palm-sized hand-sewn sachet stuffed with bead-like grain. Amaranth is said to be everlasting."

You start the trial with someone else.
Secret.
"A knotted piece of fabric."

Slightly increases the chances of being sent to Coldwind Farm when burnt.
Stacks.
"A bloodstained cattle tag identified with the number '28'."

Slightly increases the chances of being sent to Red Forest when burnt.
Stacks
"A slick and soft rock, polished by a stream. Decorated with red, black and white paint to depict a serious looking bear."

A terrific stomach-churning cake to mark our three years together. Grants 103% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories for all players this trial.
Stacks
“Happy Anniversary! Here's to our three years together!"
– The Dead by Daylight Team

Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Haddonfield when burnt.
"A house key, mundane in appearance. A cardboard key-tag attached to it reads 'Strode Real Estate', followed by a handwritten address: '45 Lampkin Lane'."

Slightly increases the chances of being sent to the Autohaven Wreckers when burnt.
Stacks.
"A heavily rusted, bent and torn metal sheet."

Calls on The Entity to create 2 more chests.
Stacks.
"A clean and polished piece of gold."

Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Coldwind Farm when burnt.
Stacks.
"A silver heart locket necklace. The simple interior is engraved with the following: 'E+M'."

Allows you to take on the role of The Doctor for the next trial. Your current perks and add-ons will not be used.
Secret.
"Your secrets are safe with me."

Tremendously increases the chance to be sent to Hawkins National Laboratory when burnt.
"A soggy, bloodstained identification card with a serial number."

Slightly increases the chances of being sent to Léry's Memorial Institute when burnt.
Stacks.
"A yellow carbon-copy certificate which admits a patient into immediate detention for emergency treatment. Copied information are smudged and unreadable."

Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Red Forest when burnt.
"A beautifully crafted tiger mask that would fit snug on a child's face. A faded note in Cyrillic letters can be found scripted on the back."

Grants 50% bonus Bloodpoints in the Brutality category.
Stacks.
"Crafted out of bloody sticks and guts, this wreath calls on The Entity's blessing for more blood."

Slightly increases luck.
Personal.Stacks.
"A small cotton pouch filled with a white chalky powder of unknown origin. Some believe it brings good fortune."

All Survivors start the trial separated.
Secret.
"A thin black shroud which is falling apart."

Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Yamaoka Estate when burnt.
"You never leave a broken home. You only run away until the memories stop haunting you."

Considerably increases the chances of being sent to Coldwind Farm when burnt.
Stacks.
"A bloodstained cattle tag identified with 'Coldwind Farm' and the number '81'."

Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Backwater Swamp when burnt.
"A leather-bound binder containing horrible human meat recipes such as the granny-slappin' good chili."

All survivors start the trial together.
Secret.
"A square and washed out piece of fabric with small knots on each end."

Allows you to take on the role of The Nightmare for the next trial. Your current perks and add-ons will not be used.
Secret.

Calls upon The Entity for the darkest moonlight.
"Better go back to sleep, there is no moon this night."

Slightly lessens the Dark Mist.
Stacks.
"The Mist rolls in, traps all in Its deep madness. There is no running, no escape, no asylum, except for the clear waters of the pond lost in the forest." -Unknown, Notebook

Grants the ability to kill one Survivor who has been hooked by your hand during the next trial.Secret.
"Grant me the favor of killing one."

Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints in the Brutality category.
Stacks.
"Crafted with a fiery, undying passion out of bloody sticks and guts, this wreath calls on The Entity's blessing for more blood."

Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints in the Hunting category.
Stacks.
"Crafted with a fiery, undying passion out of sharp metals, ropes and feathers, this wreath calls on The Entity's blessing for more blood."

Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Springwood when burnt.
"Betrayed by the town, he exacts his revenge by taking all their children."

Considerably increases the chances of being sent to Red Forest when burnt.
Stacks
"An ancient and decrepit story book, the pages of which have been lost to the elements."

Allows you to take on the role of The Shape for the next trial. Your current perks and add-ons will not be used.
Secret.
"He came home!" - Dr. Sam Loomis

Considerably increases the chances of being sent to Léry's Memorial Institute when burnt.
Stacks.
"A Psychiatric report signed by Herman Carter. It describes the memory deterioration of a patient and contains suggestions for next steps in the procedure."

Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints in the Sacrifice category.
Stacks.
"Crafted with a fiery, undying passion out of sticks, strings and bones, this wreath calls on The Entity's blessing for more blood."

Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to the Autohaven Wreckers when burnt.
Stacks.
"A broken key belonging to a vehicle of unknown brand. A keychain attached to it identifies the owner as a certain A. Azarov."

Grants 75% bonus Bloodpoints in the Brutality category.
Stacks.
"Devoutly crafted out of bloody sticks and guts, this wreath calls on The Entity's blessing for more blood."

Grants 75% bonus Bloodpoints in the Sacrifice category.
Stacks.
"Devoutly crafted out of sticks, strings and bones, this wreath calls on The Entity's blessing for more blood."

Grants 50% bonus Bloodpoints in the Hunting category.
Stacks.
"Crafted out of sharp metals, ropes and feathers, this wreath calls on The Entity's blessing for more blood."

A spectacularly grim cake to mark our four years together. 1% tastier than a Gruesome Gateau. Grants 104% bonus Bloodpoints in all categories for all players this trial.
Stacks
"Happy Anniversary! Here's to many more!"
- The Dead by Daylight Team

Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Crotus Prenn Asylum when burnt.
"A burned portrait of a couple on their wedding day, the faces are completely charred and unidentifiable."

Calls upon The Entity to Considerably decrease the distance between sacrificial hooks appearing in the world.
Stacks.
"A ruined piece of oak oozing with a black putrescent liquid."

Allows you to take on the role of The Hag for the next trial. Your current perks and add-ons will not be used.
Secret.
"Avoid walking in the mud or The Hag will eat your bones."

Calls upon The Entity for a dimmed moonlight.
"The moon slowly fades into a smile: 'Don't worry, your secret is safe with me.' Or is it a grin?"

Burning this offering grants you protection against the loss of your item and add-ons.
"Keep me from evil, defend me, and pass away."

Considerably increases the chances of being sent to the MacMillan Estate when burnt.
Stacks.
"A faded-out ledger page referring to mining related equipment and other transactions. Signed by Archie MacMillan."

Considerably increases luck.
Personal.Stacks.
"A small leather pouch displaying a straight white line hand-sewn on one of its sides. The bag is filled with an ivory chalky powder that shines under the moonlight. Some believe it brings good fortune."

Greatly thickens the Dark Mist.
Stacks.
"The Mist seems to protect us from the beast, but it is a poison, a cancer, filling us with darkness and insanity." -Unknown, Notebook

Grants 50% bonus Bloodpoints in the Objective category.
Personal.Stacks.
"A palm-sized hand-sewn sachet filled with dry leaves. Releases a faint tea-like aroma."

Allows you to take on the role of The Cannibal for the next trial. Your current perks and add-ons will not be used.
Secret.
"You like this face? " -Hitchhiker

Calls upon The Entity to generate 1 Grill Hook and 1 Frozen Cocktail Machine.As a Killer, hook a Survivor on a Grill Hook for the first time to gain a Survivor Chop. Grants bonus Bloodpoints.As a Survivor, complete repairs on a Frozen Cocktail Machine for all Survivors to gain a Frosty Margarita. Grants bonus Bloodpoints.Only playable during Scorching Summer BBQ Event. NOTE: During the event, 2 default Grill Hooks and 2 default Frozen Cocktail Machines will spawn in the map.Stacks.
"Kick back and relax in the moonlight with an ice cold drink and some barbecued meats. The Entity has invited you to enjoy yourself this fine evening."

Considerably increases luck of all Survivors.
Stacks.
"A tightly sealed glass jar containing torn human lips floating in a murky brine. Some believe it brings good fortune."

Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints in the Altruism category.
Personal.Stacks.
"Golden flowers harvested at their peak. Releases a strong earthy and comforting aroma."

Calls on The Entity to create 1 more chest.
Stacks.
"A round piece of metal which has lost all sheen."

Calls on The Entity to prevent the appearance of 1 chest.
Stacks.
"A defaced coin of unknown origin."

Grants 75% bonus Bloodpoints in the Boldness category.
Personal.Stacks.
"A bunch of flowers with pink petals and a blood red core. Releases a spicy, clove-like scent."

Calls upon The Entity for a brighter moonlight.
"The old moon shows her face, looking down on the prey."

Grants 75% bonus Bloodpoints in the Altruism category.
Personal.Stacks.
"Golden flowers harvested at their peak. The primrose opens at the very last moment before the sun gives place to the night."

Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to the MacMillan Estate when burnt.
Stacks.
"MacMillan's skeletal remains were found in the basement of the mine's storehouse. His leg bones shattered into pieces and a mining hammer lying in his lap."

Grants 50% bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness category.
Stacks.
"Crafted out of blackened branches and coals, this wreath calls on The Entity's blessing for more blood."

Considerably increases the chances of being sent to the Autohaven Wreckers when burnt.
Stacks.
"A rusted and bent license plate from the state of Virginia."

Grants the ability to kill all survivors who have been hooked by your hand during the next trial.Secret.
"I could swear It spoke to the beast. It came to a halt, as if calmly listening to the leaves rustling, and then… grinned."

Grants 100% bonus Bloodpoints in the Survival category.
Personal.Stacks.
"The pale green leaves are highlighted with peculiar crimson veins. Releases a strong radish aroma."

Grants 75% bonus Bloodpoints in the Hunting category.
Stacks.
"Devoutly crafted out of sharp metals, ropes and feathers, this wreath calls on The Entity's blessing for more blood."

Considerably increases the chances of being sent to Haddonfield when burnt.
Stacks.
"A moldy and rotten beaded oak clapboard like the ones found on most houses of Haddonfield."

Tremendously increases the chances of being sent to Léry's Memorial Institute when burnt.
"Bent reading glasses. Speckles of dried blood can be seen on the shattered lens."

Grants 75% bonus Bloodpoints in the Objective category.
Personal.Stacks.
"A beautiful purple flower that grows in the midst of the tainted swamp. Releases a mild tea-like aroma."

Moderately increases luck.
Personal.Stacks.
"A small cotton pouch half-filled with a cream colored chalky powder of unknown origin. Releases a faint herbal aroma. Some believe it brings good fortune."

Moderately increases luck of all Survivors.
Stacks.
"A friable miniature statuette made of black salt representing a woman in a kneeling position offering a gift. Some believe it brings good fortune."

Calls upon The Entity to Slightly decrease the distance between sacrificial hooks appearing in the world.
Stacks.
"A damp and decaying piece of oak replete with mold."

Considerably increases the chances of being sent to Backwater Swamp when burnt.
Stacks.
"A welcome sign made from a coarse piece of water polished cypress board. The sign is charred and still fuming."

Burning this offering grants you protection against the loss of your add-ons at the end of the trial.
"Hear my voice, spare my ways, protect me from the void."

Moderately thickens the Dark Mist.
Stacks.
"The Mist is alluring, hypnotizing. I love It and fear It at the same time." -Donna's Sketchbook

Grants 75% bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness category.
Stacks.
"Devoutly crafted out of blackened branches and coals, this wreath calls on The Entity's blessing for more blood."

perks.description:
Those whose lives are intertwined in darkness are destined to suffer together.

When a Survivor heals another Survivor for one health state at least 32 meters away from the Killer, the Survivor performing the healing action will scream, revealing their location and activating Deathbound for the next 60 seconds. During that time, the Survivor will suffer from the Oblivious status effect when further than 8 meters away from the healed Survivor.

You open lockers 50% faster.

Survivors who exit lockers suffer from the Exposed status effect for 15 seconds and their location is revealed for 4 seconds.

“This is no place for cowards.” -The Legion

A Hex that affects all Survivors' generator repairs progress. All generators are affected by Hex: Ruin. While a generator is not being repaired by a Survivor, it will immediately and automatically regress repair progress at 200% of the normal regression speed.

The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

“A curse is upon you. It will be your ruin.”

You become obsessed with one Survivor.

After hooking the Obsession, Dead Man's Switch activates for the next 45 seconds. 

While activated, any Survivor that stops repairing a generator before it is fully repaired causes The Entity to block the generator until Dead Man's Switch's effect ends. 

Affected generators are highlighted by a white aura.

The Killer can only be obsessed with one survivor at a time.

"I've seen the look on a man's face when he realizes he's going to die." -Caleb Quinn

While you have a reputation for being self-centered, you risk it all to help those in need.

When you unhook a Survivor, the unhooked Survivor leaves no scratch marks or blood trail for the next 8 seconds. You see The Killer's aura and The Killer sees your aura for 4 seconds.

“I promised to keep you shitheads safe, and that's exactly what I plan on doing.” -Steve Harrington

Strengthens the potential of you and your team's aura reading abilities.
Increases aura reading ranges by 8 meters.
“Paying attention is what kept me alive through the years. That, and my good looks of course.” -Ace

You do not make as much noise as others when quickly vaulting over obstacles or hiding in lockers. The vault and hide actions' noise detection and audio range is reduced by 100%.
This effect can only be triggered once every 20 seconds.

The display of your Powers creates a whirlwind of panic that spreads throughout the land.

You become obsessed with one Survivor. Hitting the Obsession with a basic attack transfers your Terror Radius to the Obsession for 30 seconds, and sets its radius to 32 meters. You are granted the Undetectable status effect for the duration.

The Survivor with the transferred Terror Radius is also considered to be "inside the Terror Radius" for other purposes.

The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

“And terror shall take hold of a defiant non-believer, who shall falsely announce my arrival.” (The Tablet of Adiris, 48.9)

You have been through immense hardship and you're stronger for it.

Gain the Endurance status effect for 8 seconds after being healed or having recovered from the dying state. During this time, any damage that would put you in the dying state will instead apply Deep Wounds. You have 20 seconds to Mend yourself. If you take any damage while affected by Deep Wounds, or if the timer ends, you are immediately put into the dying state.

While cursed by a hex, you can fully recover from the dying state.

You are apt at handling machinery with the greatest care and precision.
The noises caused by your repairs and their hearing distance are reduced by 8 meters. On a failed repair Skill Check, there is a 50% chance the generator explosion will be prevented.
“I'm gonna stealth this one.” -Feng Min

Meticulous in your approach, terrifying in your application.
While in a chase, your Terror Radius is increased by 8 meters. Otherwise, your Terror Radius is decreased by 8 meters and your field of view is increased by 10 degrees.
Field of view gains do not stack.
"It's time for your treatment!" -The Doctor

Your presence alone instills great fear. Survivors within your Terror Radius suffer from inefficiency.
Affected Survivors' item consumption rates are increased by 100%.
"Shit!! I dropped the gauze!"

You risk life and injury for others.

For the People is only active while at full health.

Press the Active Ability button while healing another Survivor without a med kit to instantly heal them from dying to injured, or from injured to healthy.

You become injured and receive the Broken status effect for 90 seconds.

You become the Obsession.

Equipping this perk decreases your chances to be The Killer's Obsession at the start of the trial.

"We can write our own story and decide how it really ends." -Zarina Kassir

You get excited in anticipation of hooking your prey. Increases your movement speed while transporting bodies by 18%. While transporting a body, your Terror Radius is increased by 12 meters.
"At some point, the excitement of hooking one of us becomes more important than the desire to kill us."

Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. The auras of unopened chests and items in the environment are revealed to you when standing within a 32 meter range. Grants a considerably better chance at finding an item of higher rarity from chests.
"The pioneers used to loot these babies for hours." -Lost Tapes: Aizeyu

When a Generator is repaired to 70% repair progress, it triggers a loud noise notification and you are granted the Undetectable status effect for 16 seconds.
"The Hillbilly makes impressive tools out of scraps. Tools aimed at maiming us in creative ways..." -Notebook

Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Dying or injured allies' auras are revealed to you when within a 128 meter range. Empathy does not reveal auras of allies when they are in direct contact with the Killer.

The increased pressure of losing your prey fills you with anger and gives you unsuspected motivation. Each time the Survivors complete repairs on a generator, Fire Up grows in power.
For each generator completed, gain a 4% stackable buff that grants a speed bonus to picking up, dropping, vaulting, damaging generators, and breaking pallets and breakables for the remainder of the trial.

As soon as an Exit Gate is opened, Blood Warden is activated. The auras of any Survivors located within Exit areas are revealed to you. 
Once per match, hooking a Survivor while Blood Warden is active calls upon The Entity to block both Exits for all Survivors for 60 seconds.

For every other Survivor working on a generator within a 4 meter range, gain 15% repair speed bonus. This same bonus is also applied to all other Survivors within range.
Gain 100% more Bloodpoints for coop actions.
Survivors can only be affected by one Prove Thyself effect at a time.
"Show me what you can do!" -Dwight

When starting to run, break into a sprint at 150% of your normal running speed for a maximum of 3 seconds.
Causes the Exhausted status effect for 40 seconds.
Sprint Burst cannot be used while Exhausted.
You do not recover from the Exhausted status effect while running.

An unnatural tingle warns you of impending doom. Get notified when the Killer is looking directly in your direction and standing within a 36 meter range. While Spine Chill is active, Skill Check trigger odds are increased by 10% with success zones reduced by 10%. While Spine Chill is active, your speed while repairing, sabotaging, healing, unhooking, vaulting, cleansing, opening exit gates and searching are increased by 6%.
"There is a voice that doesn't use words. Listen." -Lost Tapes: Sassy

Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Paranoia paired with the horror of failure drives you to avoid repeating the same mistakes.
The auras of 3 generators which are in close proximity to one another are revealed to you for 60 seconds, at the start of the match and each time a generator is completed.
If you are holding a map that can track generators, generators revealed by Deja Vu are added to the map.

You transform plants found around the campfire into tinctures that slow down bleeding. Healing speed and healing item efficiency are increased by 33%.

"Basic botany knowledge could save your life someday."

You stand up for yourself, using whatever's on hand to gain an advantage.

Press and hold the Active Ability button for 4 seconds while standing beside a dropped pallet to reset it to its upright position.

Any Means Necessary has a cooldown of 120 seconds.

“I'll hit you with everything I've got. Then I'll do it again.” -Yui Kimura

Helping others heightens your morale.

When you rescue a Survivor from a hook, gain a 100% speed increase while healing others for 90 seconds.
"I'm confident we can all escape in one piece if we help each other."
You recuperate faster from missed attacks made with your main weapon. The cooldown after missed basic attacks is reduced by 30%.
Your powerful hold on the Survivors causes escapes to be nearly impossible. Effects of Survivor struggling are reduced by 75%. Time to struggle out of your grasp is increased by 12%.

Your fervent care of the hooks found in the basement have aroused The Entity's interest. The basement hooks grant the following bonuses:
9% faster Entity progress.15% increased difficulty on escape attempts.9% increased penalty on escape fails.
"Then you will know that there is no escape. When hanging in the depths, you face the dark one."

Your running is light and soft, making your tracks harder to follow. Scratch marks stay visible 3 seconds less than normal.
"Take it slow, he knows where you've been… just like I`ve always said: live slow and die old." -Lost Tapes: Dylan

You have a knack for finding medicine. Searches through chests are 80% faster and the noises they cause along with their hearing distances are reduced by 8 meters.
Pharmacy guarantees an Emergency Med-Kit on your first completed chest search.

Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. While you are on the hook, all Survivor's auras are revealed to all other Survivors. If The Killer is within a 16 meter range, The Killer's aura is revealed to all other Survivors.

While a Survivor other than you is on the hook, all other Survivors' auras are revealed to you. If The Killer is within a 16 meter range of the hooked Survivor, The Killer's aura is revealed to you.“Be kind to one another. We're all in this together.” -Lost Tapes: Sujan

You know where to hit to make them bleed. Wounds inflicted by successful basic attacks considerably increase the survivor's bleeding frequency and causes the Mangled status effect. 
Bleeding and Mangled effects caused by Sloppy Butcher return to normal once the survivor is fully healed.
"It's in its sadistic nature. There is no swift kill as it delights in the obscene spectacle of our agonizing suffering."

When you have healed other Survivors for the equivalent of one health state, Second Wind activates. If you are already afflicted by the Broken status effect, Second Wind does not activate.

While Second Wind is activated, the next time you are unhooked or you unhook yourself, you are affected by the Broken status effect. After a total duration of 30 seconds, Second Wind automatically heals you from injured to healthy.

Second Wind deactivates once you become healthy or if you are put into the dying state before Second Wind successfully triggers. You lose the Broken status effect.

"Yeah, that's a no." -Steve Harrington

You seek retribution on those who have wronged you. A Survivor who blinds you or stuns you using a pallet or locker becomes your Obsession.

Anytime a new Survivor becomes the Obsession, they are affected by the Oblivious status effect for 60 seconds and their aura is shown to you for 4 seconds.

The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

“Only a fool would spit in a demon's face and declare victory.” -Renjiro's Doctrine 4:9

You look over your friends even in dire situations. You and your allies within a 8 meter range recover from the Exhausted, Hemorrhage, Mangled, Hindered and Blindness status effects 20% faster. Once out of range, this effect persists for 15 seconds.

A Hex rooting its power on hope. The false hope of Survivors fills you with excitement and strengthen your totems. For each Dull and Hex totem remaining on the map gain a token. 
Gain 10% more Bloodpoints for actions in the Hunter category for each token.Survivors' cleansing speed is reduced by 6% for each token.Gain a notification when someone starts working on a Hex totem.
The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

Like a hunting scent hound, you smell traces of blood at a great distance. Fresh blood marks are considerably more discernible than normal and can be tracked for 4 seconds longer than normal.
"Pebbles shimmering in the moonlight; my life drips down in a trail so easy to follow."

Your agility is incomparable.

"Oh, that gun's no good. The old way… with a sledge! You see, that way's better. They die better that way." -Nubbins Sawyer

You guide your victims along a path of pain and punishment.

After kicking a generator, you become Undetectable for 16 seconds. During this time, the generator's yellow aura is revealed to Survivors.

This effect can only trigger once every 60 seconds.

The growing odds of a successful escape fill you with hope and give you wings. As soon as the Exit Gates are powered you gain a 7% Haste status effect for 120 seconds.

"Buckle up, fuckos! Let's roll!" -Lost Tapes: Nikki

Sharing painful experiences has the power to heal.
While injured, healing a Survivor without using a med-kit also heals you at a 50% conversion rate.
“Showing up when things get rough, listening to people's problems, and supporting those in need; that's how you become stronger, that's how you grow.” –Jane Romero

Years of evading the cops taught you a thing or two about stealth. Your movement speed while crouching is increased by 100%.
"The paint is still fresh but I'm long gone." -Nea

Unlocks potential in one's aura-reading ability.

You see the aura of every Survivor that:
You rescue from a hook, or rescues you from a hook;You complete a healing action on, or completes a healing action on you.
They also see your aura.

This occurs for up to 3 Survivors. All effects of Aftercare are reset when you are hooked by The Killer.

“A Mercy that Rips the Storm.”
Oil work to honor my best buddies who happen to be the best musicians I know. Their first album is still my favorite. It got me through a dark time in my life. –Jeff, oil on canvas, 16x16

Your great strength allows you to shred through your prey's defenses. Destroy dropped pallets, breakable walls, and generators 20% faster.
"It's more than muscles. A dark power motivates the beast."

You are affected by the Broken status effect for the duration of the trial.
Your thick blood coagulates practically instantly. You don't leave pools of blood.Grunts of pain caused by injuries are reduced by 50% at any time.Grants the ability to fully recover from the dying state.
“I lost it. Just lamped him one. They went and banned me didn't they. Went t'pub afterwards, had a few pints and moved on to the next chapter. I couldn't be mithered with it all anyway, you know what I mean? Can't be arsed.” -David King

Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Once all generators are powered, Exit Gates are revealed to you within a 128 meter range. While opening the Exit Gates, reveal your aura to other Survivors up to 128 meters.
While Wake Up! is active, you open the Exit Gates 15% faster.

You have developed an efficient way to get out of Bear Traps and off hooks.
Grants up to 3 extra escape attempts on the hook.The odds of freeing yourself from Bear Traps is increased by 25%.

When you have a goal in mind, there's no turning back: better to ask forgiveness than permission. 

You can see your own scratch marks at all times.

While uninjured, you walk 20% faster.

"I wanna finish what we started. I want to kill it." -Nancy Wheeler

Long nights out taught you to do a lot with what you've got. Reduce consumption rate of item charge by 25% for you and allies within a 8 meter range. Once out of range, this effect persists for 15 seconds.
"You're doing it wrong! Let me show you how it's done." -Nea

Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Allies' auras are revealed to you when they are within a 36 meter range.
"We have to work as a team, I need you to survive so that I can survive!" -Dwight

Their courage fades in the face of undeniable mortality.
For each injured, dying, or hooked survivor, all survivors receive a penalty of 4% to a maximum of 16% to repair, healing and sabotage speeds.
"She plays with us and revels in our pain."
Your presence alone instills great fear. Survivors within your Terror Radius have a 50% penalty to healing progress speed.

You have a rudimentary understanding of The Entity's voice. Sporadically hear The Entity's whisper when standing within a 32 meter range of a Survivor.
"It's unclear as to the motivations of The Fog, but it is undeniable that it often takes the beast's side." -Notebook

A deep bond with The Entity unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. After hooking a Survivor, all other Survivors' auras are revealed to you for 4 seconds when they are further than 40 meters from the hook.
Each time that a Survivor is hooked for the first time, gain a 25% stackable bonus to all bloodpoint gains up to a maximum of 100%.
The bonus Bloodpoints are only awarded post-trial.
"I just can't take no pleasure in killing. There's just some things you gotta do. Don't mean you have to like it." -Drayton Sawyer

Any time 2 Survivors or more are working on the same generator, the generator's aura is highlighted in yellow for 12 seconds.

“Smartasses get killed. We always see to that.” -The Legion

Each pallet you break magnifies the wrath of The Entity.
After breaking 2 pallets, the next time you are stunned by a pallet, The Entity will instantly break the pallet.
You still suffer from the stun effect penalty.
“Fury is her blood.”

Your prayers invoke a dark power that meddles with the Survivors's chances of survival. 3 generators located furthest from you are blocked by The Entity for 120 seconds at the start of the trial.
Survivors cannot repair these generators for the duration. Affected generators are highlighted by a white aura.

“It shall be known across the land that the Gods curse the unfaithful.” (The Tablet of Adiris, 3.7.)

A Hex rooting its power on hope. You are animated by the power of your Hex Totem when the Survivors are on the verge of escaping.
Once the Exit Gates are powered, if there is a Dull Totem remaining on the map, this Hex is applied to it.</br>
While this Hex is active,Survivors suffer from the Exposed status effect.Your movement speed is increased by 4%
The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

"And the beast became faster and more powerful as if The Entity's shadowy whips were lashing at its back."

You've learned that a quiet approach is sometimes best. 

Once you are unhooked or escape from the hook, Off the Record activates for 80 seconds. 

While Off the Record is active, your aura will not be shown to The Killer and grunts of pain caused by injuries are reduced by 100%.

"Trust me, I investigate thoroughly and discreetly." -Zarina Kassir

When a Survivor rescues another from a hook at least 32 meters away from you, Make your Choice causes the Survivor to scream and applies the Exposed status effect to them for 60 seconds.
Make your Choice has a cooldown of 60 seconds. 
"You'd be surprised what tools can save a life." -Amanda Young

You become obsessed with one Survivor.
Your obsession gains a 33% action speed bonus to unhooking and healing other Survivors.
Each time you hook a Survivor other than the Obsession, if the Obsession is alive, gain a token.
If the Obsession is alive, all Survivors who are not the Obsession get 3% penalty to Repair, Healing and Sabotage speeds for each token.
The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.
"This isn't a man..." -Dr.Sam Loomis

Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Survivors' auras are revealed to you for 3 seconds when they enter the basement and you are more than 32 meters away from the basement entrance.
Territorial Imperative can only be triggered once every 20 seconds.

survivors.biography:
A determined Survivor, prepared to weather any challenge.

Her personal perks, Sole Survivor, Object of Obsession and Decisive Strike, grant her powerful survival abilities at the cost of leaving her exposed.

An urban artist, able to easily escape and hide.

Her personal perks, Balanced Landing, Urban Evasion and Streetwise, make her well suited to completing objectives and rapid evasion.

A resolute dreamwalker, increasing the survivability and recovery of his team.

His personal perks, Wake Up!, Pharmacy and Vigil, help Survivors locate Exit Gates and recover more easily.

A studious botanist, able to boost her team's survivability as well as her own.

Her personal perks, Empathy, Botany Knowledge and Self Care, allow her to spot injured Survivors and heal her team and herself more effectively.

A resourceful teacher, able to adapt to new circumstances and develop strategies accordingly. 

His personal perks, Diversion, Deliverance and Autodidact, help him to distract The Killer, survive desperate situations, and become more skilled as the trial continues.

A hopeful songbird, able to make the most of her surroundings. 

Her personal perks, Dance With Me, Windows of Opportunity and Boil Over, grant her the foresight and feistiness to escape even the most dire situations.

An "alone wolf," cocky and headstrong; a man built for survival.

His personal perks, Flip-Flop, Buckle Up and Mettle of Man, give him additional resilience to pain and hardship, as well as the ability to help his friends out of sticky situations.

A nervous leader, able to locate his allies and increase their effectiveness.

His personal perks, Bond, Prove Thyself and Leader, allow him to get in proximity of other Survivors and provide bonuses to their actions as well as his own.

A plucky documentarian, able to use her street smarts to avoid detection and greatly assist other Survivors.

Her personal perks, Off The Record, Red Herring and For the People, help her remain hidden in the face of danger, create distractions, and quickly heal others by forgoing her own safety.

An influential celebrity, going against the grain to tackle challenges head on.

Her personal perks, Solidarity, Poised and Head On, give her a flexible skillset that allow her to help others, as well as herself, to escape dangerous situations.

An energetic athlete, able to outrun most Killers.

Her personal perks, Quick & Quiet, Sprint Burst and Adrenaline, give her advantage to escape chases and put distance between herself and the Killer.

An aspiring journalist, able to make acute observations and gain insights that others may miss.

Her personal perks, Better Together, Fixated and Inner Strength, give her the information and courage she needs to tackle unexpected challenges.

An obsessed detective, able to locate and complete objectives faster.

His personal perks, Tenacity, Detective's Hunch and Stake Out, make him objective-focused and able to rapidly recover.

A quiet artist, standing steadfast against impossible odds.

His personal perks, Breakdown, Aftercare and Distortion, give him observational advantages and help to hide his presence from The Killer.

Cheryl Mason is a young veteran of terror, emboldening both herself and her team.

Her personal Perks, Soul Guard, Blood Pact, and Repressed Alliance, allow her to survive through immense hardship, stay in contact with team members, and plan objectives.

An old soldier, accustomed to dealing with critical situations.

His personal perks, Left Behind, Borrowed Time and Unbreakable, make him more powerful in dire moments.

A rugged scrapper, rewarding high-risk play.

His personal perks, We're Gonna Live Forever, Dead Hard and No Mither, reward an aggressive, confrontational playstyle but leave him vulnerable.

An objective-focused competitor who can quickly adapt her strategy to meet a vast range of challenging situations.

Her personal perks, Technician, Lithe and Alert, help her with repairing generators and locating the Killer.

A solitary survivalist, able to hold his own in most situations.

His personal perks, Iron Will, Calm Spirit and Saboteur, allow him to more effectively move about the environment and survive while injured.

A former jock, able to protect and support his fellow Survivors while providing his own brand of humor.

His personal perks, Babysitter, Camaraderie and Second Wind, enable him to distract Killers, tolerate pain, and get back into the fight.

A hardened street racer, able to gain advantages for her and her fellow Survivors in challenging situations. Her personal perks, Lucky Break, Any Means Necessary and Breakout, enable her to cover her blood trails, reset dropped pallets, and assist helpless Survivors.

A lucky gambler, improving the odds of the entire team.

His personal perks, Open Handed, Up the Ante and Ace in the Hole, boost the Luck of all survivors and help with chest searches.

killers.biography:
A devout Killer, able to infect Survivors from a short distance using her power, Vile Purge. Survivors inflicted by this contamination risk becoming injured or broken, unless they find a way to cure themselves in a Pool of Devotion.

Her personal perks, Corrupt Intervention, Infectious Fright and Dark Devotion, give her the ability to hinder Survivor objectives, while simultaneously confusing and frightening those within her presence.

A strategic Killer, able to control and corral survivors by throwing bottles of The Afterpiece Tonic to create clouds of noxious gas that cover large areas for a short amount of time. Survivors intoxicated by the gas are inflicted with impaired vision and movement speed, and give away their location by coughing loudly.

His personal perks, Bamboozle, Coulrophobia and Pop Goes the Weasel, provide vaulting advantages and negatively impact Survivor healing speed and repairs.

An area-control Killer, able to apply pressure across the map by placing deadly Bear Traps for Survivors to step in.

His personal perks, Unnerving Presence, Brutal Strength and Agitation, allow him to chase and carry Survivors more effectively.

A cursed Killer, able to place traps and then teleport to them when activated, using her Blackened Catalyst.

Her personal perks, Hex: The Third Seal, Hex: Ruin and Hex: Devour Hope, apply crippling penalties to Survivors as long as the totem they are attached to remains uncleansed.

A vengeful Killer, able to spear Survivors from a distance and reel them in using his power, The Redeemer.

His personal perks, Gear Head, Dead Man's Switch, and Hex: Retribution, allow him to locate and impede Survivor objectives, and punish Survivors for destroying totems.

killers.fullName: Frank Morrison, Julie Kostenko, Susie, Joey
killers.biography:
A band of merciless Killers, able to rushdown helpless Survivors with their power, Feral Frenzy. Attacks made during their frenzy inflict lingering internal damage, downing any Survivors that are not quick enough to react.

Their personal perks, Discordance, Mad Grit and Iron Maiden, give them the ability to locate their prey and attack savagely while transporting Survivors to the hook.

A map-manipulation Killer, able to torment Survivors with the hazards he creates. Affected Survivors will be vulnerable to his special hook, the Cage of Atonement, and his unique mori, Final Judgment.

His personal Perks, Forced Penance, Trail of Torment, and Deathbound, allow him to aggressively pursue his prey while deceiving and tracking Survivors.

A chainsaw-wielding Killer, able to trigger a deadly frenzy using Bubba's Chainsaw, immediately downing anyone in its path.

His personal perks, Knock Out, Barbecue & Chili and Franklin's Demise, make Survivors easier to locate while robbing them of their tools and abilities.

A tormenting Killer, able to crouch into stealth mode, then ambush Survivors from a short distance. She can also apply Reverse Bear Traps to downed Survivors, forcing them to remove it before the timer runs out. If the timer expires, they die instantly.

Her personal perks, Hangman's Trick, Surveillance and Make Your Choice, give her more map control and expose altruistic Survivors.

A monstrous Killer, able to absorb the blood energy of his injured foes, and then use that energy to transform into a brutal demon. Using his power, Yamaoka's Wrath, he can rush down Survivors at great speed and deal deadly strikes with his kanabō.

His personal perks, Zanshin Tactics, Blood Echo and Nemesis, provide navigational information, punish injured Survivors, and gain advantages over those that interfere.

A stealth Killer, able to cloak and uncloak at the ringing of his Wailing Bell.

His personal perks, Predator, Bloodhound and Shadowborn, give him extra abilities to track and locate Survivors, making him a very efficient hunter.

A high-mobility Killer, able to cover large distances in a short amount of time and instantly down Survivors using his Chainsaw.

His personal perks, Enduring, Lightborn and Tinkerer, allow him to enhance his power and make him harder to lose during chases.

A haunting Killer, intent on monitoring Survivors from a distance to feed his power, Evil Within. The more he stalks, the stronger and faster he becomes.

His personal perks, Save the Best for Last, Play with your Food and Dying Light, select one Survivor to become the 'obsession' and will trigger deadly effects based on the Obsession's status.

An unidentified Killer, able to open multiple portals and traverse between them to cover large distances. Using its power, Of The Abyss, it can detect any Survivors within a close proximity to the portals then unleash a leaping attack to inflict damage from a distance.

Its personal perks, Surge, Cruel Limits and Mindbreaker, impact the environment close to generators and affect nearby Survivors in unexpected ways.

A nightmare inducing Killer, passively forcing Survivors into his Dream World using his power, Dream Demon. It is here that Survivors become extremely vulnerable to his dream abilities. Using his Dream Projection ability he is able to quickly appear across the map and put pressure on Survivors.

His personal perks, Fire Up, Remember Me and Blood Warden, improve his abilities over time and make him stronger as the trial reaches its climax.

A warping Killer, able to blink through obstacles and quickly close gaps with her power, Spencer's Last Breath.

Her personal perks, Stridor, Thanatophobia and A Nurse's Calling, allow her to decrease Survivor abilities and track them when they are injured.

A madness-inducing Killer who is able to use his power, Carter's Spark, to trigger electrical charges, incapacitating Survivors and eventually causing them to hallucinate and scream in terror, revealing their position.

His personal perks, Overwhelming Presence, Monitor & Abuse and Overcharge, encourage chases, impact Survivors' ability to repair effectively, and make him harder to detect when not in a chase.

A ranged Killer, able to throw Hunting Hatchets at Survivors to injure them from a distance.

Her personal perks, Beast of Prey, Territorial Imperative and Hex: Huntress Lullaby, allow her to apply pressure through better map awareness and enhanced chasing abilities.

A phase-walking Killer, able to catch Survivors off-guard with her traversal power, Yamaoka's Haunting. Her Power allows her to teleport from one place to another without being seen.

Her personal perks, Spirit Fury, Hex: Haunted Ground and Rancor, give her tools to observe and bait Survivors, and deal with obstacles directly in her path.

A creepy Killer, able to stalk his victims and sneak up silently using his power, Night Shroud. Affected Survivors will find themselves vulnerable and oblivious to his presence and must use all of their perception and awareness to protect themselves from his approach.

His personal perks, I'm All Ears, Thrilling Tremors and Furtive Chase, give him the ability to locate Survivors, defend generators, and make his chases unpredictable.
